timeline.bodyText: Just curious. Not a comment. This seems to be too verbose. Does Android support lambda expressions.
timeline.author: tapashmajumder

replies.bodyText: It does support lambda expressions if using java > 8.0 or Kotlin.
replies.author: Ayyanchira

replies.bodyText: It does or it does not, depending on the version of the build tools. Android runtime is still considered Java 6, so you have to use a desugaring compiler to transform Java 8 lambdas into Java 6 constructs. It'd be an easy 'yes' if this were a mobile app, but for a library I'm not exactly sure if we can use lambdas safely.
